title: Star Patterns Update: Law of Sines
description: This coding challenge is a follow up on the challenge #54: Islamic Star Patterns. In this video, I use the Law of Sines to simplify the tiling pattern calculation.

codeExamples.description: My visualization of the islamic star pattern.
